title: alterra57
author: alterra57
content: Hello,I'm looking to buy crypto (USDT, USDC, TUSD, DAI, EURT) with Payoneer, 10k+. I'd prefer a 1:1 rate but I'm willing to pay a premium as long as it's not some crazy percentage. Deal will be done through escrow, in this case using localcoinswap (link can be found in my signature). I'd like to keep all communications on the forum but since I can't be here all day, you can PM me your Telegram.PS, no sending first, no sending second, ESCROW ONLY! Don't waste my time if you're not going to use escrow.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Welcome to the currency exchange board!Those who want to take payoneer think twice as the transaction receiver may face few problem:eg: ##May ask for KYC## May lock the account## May disable the account## May return the account to the team## May Lock the fund and many moreIf your county allows crypto then better withdraw your fund and bu crypto which will save you and the received. Note you may faces the same issue which will be faced by the receiver.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on October 13, 2023, 05:21:24 PMWelcome to the currency exchange board!Those who want to take payoneer think twice as the transaction receiver may face few problem:eg: ##May ask for KYC## May lock the account## May disable the account## May return the account to the team## May Lock the fund and many moreIf your county allows crypto then better withdraw your fund and bu crypto which will save you and the received. Note you may faces the same issue which will be faced by the receiver.Thanks for the reply and warnings, this shouldn't be done by someone who has no idea what they're doing. Usually Payoneer to Payoneer transfers aren't as bad as when you received from outside their ecosystem so it is only in rare cases when the above happen.I know I can withdraw and so on but that would take over a week for me, I am looking for something that's faster.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Solved outside of the forum! Topic locked.
